scripts.start: concurrently -n api,web -c auto "npm run start -w api" "npm run start -w web"
scripts.dev: concurrently -n api,web -c auto "npm run dev -w api" "npm run develop -w web"
scripts.build: concurrently -n api,web -c auto --kill-others-on-fail "npm run start -w api" "wait-on http://localhost:3000/healthz && npm run build -w web"
scripts.serve: concurrently -n api,web -c auto --kill-others-on-fail "npm run start -w api" "npm run serve -w web"
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w api && npm run lint -w web
scripts.clean: npm run clean -w api && npm run clean -w web
